SHARP DC JDI Driver
devices

Detailed Description

Purpose: This module provides a hardware abstraction layer for SHARP display controllers with JDI interface, optimized for the LS014B7DD01 model. It enables high-resolution graphics rendering, display initialization, and region-based rendering for embedded applications requiring visual interfaces. The driver supports timing configuration, PWM-based VCOM/VA signal generation, and features for optimal display performance and system integration.

Key Features

  1. High-resolution Rendering: Supports 280x280 pixel graphics.
  2. Region-based Rendering: Efficient partial updates.
  3. PWM-based VCOM/VA: Signal generation for display operation.
  4. Timing Configuration: Customizable display timing parameters.
  5. Power Management: Optimized for embedded systems.

Functionality

  • Initialize and configure SHARP JDI display
  • Set up PWM timers for VCOM/VA signals
  • Manage display timing and region updates
  • Support for power-efficient operation

Usage

  1. Initialize display with am_devices_dc_jdi_sharp_init()
  2. Start/stop PWM timers for VCOM/VA signals
  3. Update display regions as needed

Configuration

  • Configure timing parameters for display
  • Set up PWM duty cycles and frequencies
  • Adjust region update settings

◆ am_devices_dc_jdi_sharp_init()

uint32_t am_devices_dc_jdi_sharp_init ( am_devices_dc_jdi_timer_config_t * pTimerConfig,
nemadc_initial_config_t * pDCConfig )

External function definitions.

Initialize sharp model type LS014B7DD01

Parameters
pTimerConfig- jdi timer configuration structure.
pDCConfig- jdi panel configuration structure.
Note
It should be called before NemaDC is initialized and configured.
Returns
status.

◆ am_devices_dc_jdi_sharp_timer_start()

void am_devices_dc_jdi_sharp_timer_start ( void )

start generate PWM signal for JDI timer.

This function generate two PWM signal one is inphase and another is opposite phase to VCOM.

Returns
None.

◆ am_devices_dc_jdi_sharp_timer_stop()

void am_devices_dc_jdi_sharp_timer_stop ( void )

stop generate PWM signal for JDI timer.

This function stop the two PWM signal.

Returns
None.
